pr_title: [BEAM-9679] Add Partition task to Core Transform katas

timeline.message: Add Partition task to Core Transform katas

timeline.bodyText:
I realize that we're using multiple versions of Beam, from v2.19 to v2.22.
Can we standardize to just one version for the entire course?
timeline.author: henryken

replies.bodyText: Thank you, @henryken for picking up on that.  I will add this to my checklist to remind me for every PR.
replies.author: damondouglas

timeline.bodyText:
Just would like to check whether you intend to have an answer placeholder for the return value?
In other tasks, we normally don't ask that.
timeline.author: henryken

replies.bodyText: My thought was to alert the individual that the return type is different than previous tasks.  Yet, they would be alerted anyway if specifying beam.PCollection instead of []beam.PCollection.  I removed it.
replies.author: damondouglas
